New Records: Klay Thompson set a franchise record with six three-pointers in his debut
Key Match Events: The Mavericks improved significantly in the second half after a slow start
Klay Thompson's performance was a turning point in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks' depth and ability to overcome preseason rust were highlighted
Dereck Lively II had a standout game with 15 points, 11 rebounds, and six assists
